item.title: Asura The Striker launches April 24
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/asura-the-striker-launches-april-24

  • PC

Arcade-style 3D shoot 'em up dated.

Arcade-style 3D shoot ’em up Asura The Striker will launch for PC via Steam on April 24 for $14.99, developer LeftOver announced. A 10 percent-off discount will be available at launch, as well as a digital soundtrack.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A fast-paced, retro-inspired 3D shooting action game created as a heartfelt homage to arcade classics from the ’80s and ’90s.

You are ASURA, a humanoid combat weapon built to eliminate an alien invasion from space. Master high-speed shooting, powerful melee attacks, and time-bending slow motion mechanics.

  • Energy Shot – Your rapid-fire ranged weapon
  • Shining Knuckle – A charged punch for devastating damage
  • Lightning Over Drive – Slow down time and control the battlefield

Key Features

  • High-speed 3D shooting action.
  • Close-range “cooperative punch” combos.
  • Slow-motion system for precision and style.
  • Multiple stage paths for replayability.

Core Action

  • Wipe out swarms of alien invaders!
  • Use Lightning Over Drive to escape danger!
  • Destroy powerful enemies with a single punch!
  • Face off against terrifying alien bosses!

Controls

  • Movement – Use the left stick or D-pad. (You can toggle whether the character auto-centers when in a neutral position.)
  • Energy Shot – Press the shot button to fire.
  • Shining Knuckle – Hold the punch button, then release to strike.
  • Lightning Over Drive – Press the slow button to slow time (consumes energy gauge).
